author: bencomic

right.text: "some idealized, perfectly innocent creature" does sound about right actually . . .

left.text: So basically, you want some idealized perfectly innocent creature... not an actual little girl.

right.text: so that's confined to fantasy, obviously...

left.text: obviously that's a goal unattainable in real life and i do not for one second believe i will ever find such a person.

right.text: a "cutesy little chick who loves anime" sounds pretty nice! you make it seem like there are lots of them

left.text: what about one of those cutesy little chicks who love anime and dress in that stuff?

title: loli is not pedo: the world according to guy, part 4
